text: Sèvremont is a commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of La Flocellière (the seat), Les Châtelliers-Châteaumur, La Pommeraie-sur-Sèvre and Saint-Michel-Mont- Mercure.Arrêté préfectoral 18 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Vendée
title: Sèvremont
